lead_paragraph: Game players who successfully practice strategic deception may have an edge in recruiting someone for a job or negotiating a higher salary, scientists say.
snippet: Game players who successfully practice strategic deception may have an edge in recruiting someone for a job or negotiating a higher salary, scientists say.

headline.main: It Costs How Much? My Brain Says Otherwise
